title: Beetroot curry
directions: Cut beetroot into 0,5 cm slices and leave aside. Finely dice both onions, garlic, ginger and tomatoes, leave aside.
In a bowl mix salt, cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, coriander and curry spices.
In another bowl mix 200ml water with the coconut milk.
Put large pan on high heat and melt butter with the oil, add onions and fry while mixing for 1 minute. Reduce the heat to half and add garlic, ginger and tomatoes. Fry while mixing for a minute.
Add beetroot and fry while mixing for a minute. Add mixture of spices and fry while mixing for another minute.
Add water with coconut milk, mix it and bring it to boil. Then reduce the heat to a third and cook for 6-8 minutes or until the beetroot is soft. Mix it occasionally.
In the end add salt if needed and mix in the fresh coriander.
